verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy, holy is the Lord!
Holy, holy is the Lord!
Holy, holy is the Lord!
Holy, holy is the Lord!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rain down Your love on us,
rain down Your love.
Rain down Your grace
and cover me.
Rain down Your love on us,
rain down Your love.
Rain down Your peace.
